Generation V.Black: They coil around foes and shock them with electricity-generating organs that seem simply to be circular patterns.
Generation V.White: These Pokémon have a big appetite. When they spot their prey, they attack it and paralyze it with electricity.
Generation V.Black 2: It wraps itself around its prey and paralyzes it with electricity from the round spots on its sides. Then it chomps.
